name: Mysticism
effect: :instant: Play this card immediately after casting a [spell](../spells/index.md). Instead of discarding the [Spell](../spells/index.md) card, take it back into your hand.
expert_effect: :instant: Play this card immediately after casting a [spell](../spells/index.md). Instead of discarding the [Spell](../spells/index.md) card and all other cards player together with it, take them back to your hand.
